description.narrative: The Project aims to improve rural livelihoods and reduce rural poverty through improved irrigation service delivery, enhanced agricultural practices, and strengthened water resources management to increase the productivity of irrigated agriculture in Chhattisgarh.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
6. R&U of minor and medium schemes covering over 177,130 ha with increased cropping intensity by end of Project.
